name: Delicious Tasses Ragout
desc: A vegetable ragout. It is said that this dish once moved a picky Fontainian gourmet to tears after reminding them of their childhood. The story may be somewhat exaggerated in some respects, but you should have no doubt that it is truly honest with regard to how tasty the dish is.

value.text: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Tasses Ragout
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tasses Ragout.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Tasses Ragout
customize.desc: A vegetable ragout. It is an improvised dish created by Fontainian farmers celebrating vegetable harvests. There are no strict rules for the amount of ingredients or the cooking method. Be it stir-fried or baked, this unpretentious dish never fails to delight with its rustic savor.

customize.name: Suspicious Tasses Ragout
customize.desc: A vegetable ragout. Don't worry too much if you are missing an ingredient or have accidentally thrown in something extra: No one will notice, as the excessive amount of seasoning has already overwhelmed the original flavors of the vegetables.
